Details.Patch-Desc: Upgrade servers from CentOS6 to CentOS7
Details.Subject: v_SUBJECT
Details.Description: For SFDC Compliance, we need to upgrade the below hosts
Details.Business-Justification: Hosts need to updated to the latest revision for compliance and security reasons
Details.Backout: ReImage host back to CentOS6. Redeploy apps.
Details.Risk-Summary:
Services Affected: Insights/Wave
 Risk if change is delayed: We might miss our deadline
Details.Impact-Summary: Low impact due to validations within ORB framework

Verif: Example of validation command executed on host.
